sentence: The carpet spoke from the cluttered office
feedback: Though this sentence is grammatically correct, carpets cannot speak, so it makes no sense. Therefore, you might select a very low acceptability for it.

sentence: Matthew planted the seeds the flowers in the backyard
feedback: The way the words are ordered in this sentence makes little sense, so you might also give this sentence a low acceptability.

sentence: In one minute the cousin braided the ribbons tight
feedback: This sentence is gets its meaning across, but the phrasing of "braided tight" might be awkward. You might move the slider towards completely acceptable but not all the way.

sentence: The girl was sleeping on the recliner by the desk.
feedback: This sentence is sensible and natural, so you might classify it as completely acceptable or close.
